decks.notes: This aggressive deck revolves around using Rograkh, Son of Rohgahh and Tevesh Szat, Doom of Fools as commanders to quickly overwhelm opponents in a fast-paced 1 vs 1 duel. The deck includes a variety of powerful black and red spells such as Demonic Tutor, Lightning Bolt, and Thoughtseize to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Key cards like Dark Ritual and Infernal Plunge help generate mana quickly, allowing for explosive plays and big threats to be deployed early in the game. The addition of cards like Blood Moon and Defense Grid can further disrupt opponents' plans, while cards like Tendrils of Agony and Yawgmoth's Bargain provide alternate win conditions for sealing the game.

The deck revolves around a aggressive strategy centered around the commander Amalia Benavides Aguirre, utilizing cards like Auriok Champion, Blood Artist, and Cruel Celebrant to drain the opponent's life and gain advantage through sacrificing creatures. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion allows for recurring small creatures from the graveyard to maintain pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes various utility lands and cards like Thoughtseize, Demonic Tutor, and Swords to Plowshares for disruption and maintaining board control. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent by constantly pressuring them with efficient creatures and disrupting their game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by leveraging Aminatou, the Fateshifter as the commander. The deck focuses on reanimation strategies, utilizing cards like Animate Dead, Reanimate, and Unburial Rites to bring back powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty. It also includes a variety of disruptive spells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Thoughtseize to hinder opponents' plans. The deck aims to maintain card advantage through card selection with Brainstorm and Ponder, while also having cards like Balance and Show and Tell to swing the game in its favor. The strategy revolves around managing resources, disrupting opponents, and taking control of the battlefield to secure victory.

The deck revolves around utilizing Phelia's abilities to create a fast and aggressive board presence, while also controlling the opponent's board with cards like Containment Priest and Palace Jailer. Cards like Aether Vial and Stoneforge Mystic help you cheat out valuable creatures and equipment, while cards like Swords to Plowshares and Path to Exile provide removal options. The deck also includes cards like Astrid Peth and Skyclave Apparition to deal with problematic threats. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of creatures, removal, and disruption, ultimately leading to victory through a combination of combat damage and strategic plays.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through various counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. Elminster is the commander that helps maintain card advantage and control the board. The deck includes a mix of permission spells like Counterspell and Mana Leak, versatile removal like Swords to Plowshares and Supreme Verdict, and powerful card draw like Cryptic Command and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. It also includes ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Archmage's Charm and Unexpectedly Absent. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes utility lands like Castle Vantress and Mystic Sanctuary. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through careful decision-making and resource management.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. Ertai Resurrected serves as the commander, providing a powerful control element to the deck. The deck includes a variety of counterspells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Cryptic Command to stop threats from resolving. Removal spells like Fatal Push, Damnation, and Toxic Deluge help to deal with opposing creatures. Card advantage is gained through cards like Brainstorm, Mystic Confluence, and Snapcaster Mage. The deck aims to disrupt opponent's game plan and outvalue them through efficient spells and strategic plays, ultimately controlling the game until Ertai Resurrected can win the game.

The deck focuses on building an aggressive strategy centered around dealing direct damage to the opponent and controlling the board with efficient spells and creatures. Kellan, Planar Trailblazer serves as the commander, providing a strong aggressive presence and generating value with its abilities. The deck contains a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Shock, and Rift Bolt, as well as aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Goblin Guide. Utilizing cards like Blood Moon and Sulfuric Vortex to disrupt the opponent's strategy and applying pressure with a steady stream of burn spells and creatures, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero before they can establish their own game plan.

The deck is centered around aggressive gameplay with a focus on dealing damage quickly and efficiently. Utilizing Malcolm, the Eyes as the commander, the deck includes a variety of low-cost spells and creatures to maintain a fast pace and pressure the opponent. It includes versatile instant spells like Lightning Bolt, Force of Will, and Cryptic Command for control and removal. The deck also includes cards like True-Name Nemesis and Vendilion Clique for disruptive elements. With an emphasis on tempo and aggression, the deck aims to outpace the opponent and maintain a strong board presence to secure a quick victory in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format game.
